name: Summer Breeze
description: I wanted something fruity last summer, and what I ended up with is this thing. I remember it being quite tasty, but I haven't mixed it in quite some time. If menthol isn't your thing, just pass this one up. It's pretty straightforward. Strawberry, Watermelon, and some lime. Throw in some menthol to cool it down. That's all there is to it.
author: SleepersDemon
